content.raw:
Looks like the [Jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/245/) failed:
~~~
Linking CXX executable gzsdf
/usr/bin/ld: CMakeFiles/gzsdf.dir/gzsdf.cc.o: undefined reference to symbol '_ZTV12TiXmlPrinter'
/usr/bin/ld: note: '_ZTV12TiXmlPrinter' is defined in DSO /usr/lib/libtinyxml.so.2.6.2 so try adding it to the linker command line
/usr/lib/libtinyxml.so.2.6.2: could not read symbols: Invalid operation
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [tools/gzsdf-2.2.1] Error 1
make[1]: *** [tools/CMakeFiles/gzsdf.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs….
~~~
